summary: Most requested functionality for configurable canonical public URL, SEO metadata fallback, and sitemap generation based on VITE_PUBLIC_URL appears implemented. However, the diff summary does not provide evidence that the Publishing & Share page includes the required plain-English Custom Domain guidance checklist and disclaimers.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add/confirm plain-English “Custom Domain” guidance on the Publishing & Share page explaining domain registration/DNS setup at registrar, propagation, and setting VITE_PUBLIC_URL + redeploying for SEO/sitemap updates, including stating the system does not purchase/register domains.
missing_requirements.reason: The modified Publishing & Share page content is truncated and the visible portion shows hosting and URL copy logic, but does not show any Custom Domain checklist/disclaimer text required by the acceptance criteria. No other file in the diff summary includes this guidance.

hallucinated_features.description: Added Google Search Console verification meta tag using %VITE_GOOGLE_SITE_VERIFICATION%.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest focuses on VITE_PUBLIC_URL for canonical URLs/SEO/sitemap and custom domain guidance; it does not request adding Google site verification configuration.

hallucinated_features.description: Added copy-to-clipboard behavior for an additional “HTML link” (static-html-example.html) beyond the two required URLs.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1 only asks to show and provide copy actions for (1) current deployment URL and (2) canonical public URL; the diff shows an additional exampleHtmlUrl and copy handler/toast not requested.
